import React from "react" import Wizard from "./WizardComponent" import { FormGroup, Input, Label, CustomInput, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardHeader, } from "reactstrap" import Checkbox from "../op-ss-component/CheckBoxesVuexy" import { Check, Home, Briefcase, Image } from "react-feather" class WizardIcons extends React.Component { state = { steps: [ { title: , content: }, { title: , content: }, { title: , content:
} label="Staffing" defaultChecked={false} />
} label="Catering" defaultChecked={false} />
} ] } render() { const { steps } = this.state return ( Wizard with Icons ) } } export default WizardIcons
